alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Ventura County Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 14 at 11:34AM PST until January 15 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts 35 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Ventura County Coast and Los Angeles County Coast from Malibu to the Hollywood Hills. * WHEN...Until 3 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Roadways may be affected by gusty cross winds. This includes Pacific Coast Highway and the 10, 105, and 405 freeways in Los Angeles County and Highway 101 and Pacific Coast Highway in Ventura County. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty Santa Ana winds could linger into Sunday and this advisory may need to be extended.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Ventura County Coast
